price: Wͻn a wͻyε ahomasoͻ no kaa sε: “Nokorε sε yε deε, yεnnye deε mogye die no nni “.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
